parameters.name: version_date
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: images_file
parameters.description: Must be a base64-encoded string. An image file (.jpg, .png) or .zip file with images. Include no more than 15 images. You can also include images with the `url` property in the **parameters** object.  All faces are detected, but if there are more than 10 faces in an image, age and gender confidence scores might return scores of 0.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: A JSON string containing the image URL to analyze.   For example: {"url": "..."}.
